about_the_game:
An adventuring guild hall was built in the country side, atop the mouth of an ancient portcullis. Beyond the steel and stone gate lies the twisting expanse of the DUNJUN, filled with vile monsters and deadly traps. Aspirants travel from lands near and far to delve into the DUNJUN’s timeless depths, seeking treasure, knowledge, and fame alike. Time has forgotten the DUNJUN’s origins, but many a rumor escapes the lips of bards, scholars, and soldiers.

In DUNJUNGUY, a party of up to four friends can test their might against the hordes of creatures in the DUNJUN. Combining Action RPG mainstays with mechanics familiar to Roguelike fans, players can choose abilities, find powerful gear, and navigate procedurally generated environments while staving off impending doom. DUNJUNGUY delivers a cartoony visual style, contrasted by its exploration of macabre and moody touchstones.


In this couch co-op dungeon-crawler you and four friends venture into the depths of a dark dungeon where enemies, traps, and loot await! Play up to 4 different classes, level up your abilities, and explore a variety of unique and handcrafted dungeons where peril awaits around every turn. After surviving each round of the DUNJUN your party may find respite in the Tavern, a place to sell loot, upgrade your player, and chat with the locals. Once you have proved your mettle as a brave adventurer DUNJUNGUY himself may permit you to enter the deepest depths of the DUNJUN where fame, glory, knowledge, and riches beyond your wildest imagination await.

Drastische Gewalt
Derbe Sprache
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: DUNJUNGUY is a randomly generated action RPG dungeon-crawler with Rogue-like elements. Following brave adventurers on their journey into the DUNJUN players will find bizarre unique items, epic loot, and pets that buff the player's abilities and enable them to fight off the endless hordes of creatures.
